channel.title: Backtracking - Tag - Blog of the Dad
channel.description: Backtracking - Tag - Blog of the Dad

item.title: Solver basics
item.description: In the previous post I’ve given a quick overview of what the solver is about, and in this post I’ll dive a little bit deeper into the subject, using N-queens with just 4 queens as an example problem. More specifically, I’ll fully specify the problem by defining the variables and constraints, and then walk through what a simple search would do, ultimately finding a solution.
